function is to regulate the concentration of water and soluble substances like 
sodium salts by filtering the blood, reabsorbing what is needed and excreting the 
rest as urine. A nephron eliminates wastes from the body, regulates blood 
volume and ... In humans, a normal kidney contains 800,000 to 1.5 million 
nephrons.
